examples.example: 亲爱的，我想对你说，我爱你，这份爱会一直陪伴着你到永远。

translate.english: Dear, I want to say to you, I love you, and this love will always accompany you forever.

examples.example: 在这个美好的世界里，我爱你是最动听的话语。

translate.english: In this beautiful world, "I love you" is the most pleasant words.

examples.example: 无论何时何地，我都想大声地对你说：我爱你。

translate.english: No matter when and where, I always want to loudly say to you: I love you.
